value.title: Artificial intelligence searches for the human touch

They assist in making decisions across a spectrum that ranges from advertising products to diagnosing medical conditions.

value.title: Ethical AI: AI with Morality
value.excerpt: As soon as the term Artificial Intelligence comes into a discussion somewhere in the corners of the mind there arrives a scenario much like the movie ‘Terminator’. But relax our current discussion will not be about whether machines will take control over humans or not until and unless we want so.

value.title: MVP versus EVP: Is it time to introduce ethics into the agile startup model?
value.excerpt: Rather than developing a minimum viable product (MVP), companies should develop and roll out an ethically viable product (EVP) based on responsible artificial intelligence (RAI).

value.title: AI-powered chatbots, designed ethically, can support high-quality university teaching
value.excerpt: While COVID-19 forced an emergency transformation to online learning at universities, learning how to teach efficiently and effectively online using different platforms and tools is a positive addition to education and is here to stay.
